translations: （技）使混合，掺和（admix 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: At the same time, it is found that the admixing of the certain rock asphalt can efficiently enhance the performance of mixture.
sentences.translation: 同时还发现，掺加一定量的岩沥青，可以有效提高混合料的性能，建议在橡胶粒沥青混合料中掺加适量的岩沥青。

sentences.sentence: The container preferably facilitates the selective activation of the peelable seals to permit the admixing of less than all the separately stored components.
sentences.translation: 该容器优选便于可剥离密封的选择性开启，以允许混合少于全部的单独存储的组分。

sentences.sentence: The two concepts of slag blending ratio in cement and admixing quantity of slag are liable to be confused when producing cement with clinker powder and slag powder.
sentences.translation: 采用熟料粉、矿渣粉拌和水泥生产工艺，往往易混淆水泥中矿渣粉配比和矿渣掺入量这两个概念。
